title: マイルCSの後に・バイブスアゲてこ

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, as expected of Helios-san, that was a wonderful race!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Thanks! Yeah, today my vibe was totally amped up, maybe!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Vibe, huh~! Maybe that's what I was lacking!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hmm, like being hyped up and going all out?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hyped up and going all out... hmm?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: This seems like something worth researching and tinkering with!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Aha! I'll master my explosive escapes, then we'll race again! Okay!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Of course, next time I'll win for sure!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hehe! Well, thanks for today, Tannhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ahh~, I'm glad I got to run with Helios-san today!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Like in the paddock, you were really energetic even in the gate and during the race!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It was enough to give me power too. There really are amazing Umamusume, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Speak of the devil, it's Helios-san!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Today's vibe hype fest, wanna come too, Tannhauser?'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: This... I feel like I can get one step closer to solving the mystery of vibes!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mufufu~n♪ I'm looking forward to it~.
